document_data.mainbody:
ulmasters Street was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Tulmasters Street was located in the central section of Waterdeeps Southern Ward. The road branched south from the Rising Ride near the High Road. Tulmasters Street then passed southeast for several blocks before ending on Caravan Street just north of Tilmans Lane. The road also connected with Sethmas Court and Tezambrils Street.
Coach & Wagon Hall and Saddlers & Harness-Makers Hall sat at opposite sides of the intersection of Tulmasters Street with the Rising Ride.
